name: OutRun (WIP)
description:
Simple outrun game created in Processing (you need Processing in order to run this little game)

Use A (or Left) and D (or Right) to move

Avoid the traffic!

Features
  • Collision detection
  • Score
To do
  • Add sounds and music
  • Improve traffic
  • Adding different levels of difficulty
  • Adding menu
  • Improve collisions
